AdminChanged(address,address).details: Emitted when the admin account has changed.

BeaconUpgraded(address).details: Emitted when the beacon is changed.

Upgraded(address).details: Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.

cancelStream().details: Allows the creator to cancel the stream during the Waiting phase

cancelWithAdmin().details: Allows the protocol admin to cancel the stream

exitStream().details: Allows users to exit the stream and receive their tokens based on stream outcome

finalizeStream().details: Allows the creator to finalize the stream after it has ended

implementation().details: Returns the implementation name for identification

initialize((address,address,address,uint.details: Initializes the stream with the provided configuration

params.storageAddress: Address of the position storage contract

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

subscribe(uint256,bytes32[]).details: Allows users to subscribe to the stream by providing input tokens

params.amountIn: Amount of input tokens to subscribe with

subscribeWithNativeToken(uint256,bytes32.details: Allows users to subscribe with native tokens

params.amountIn: Amount of native tokens to subscribe with

subscribeWithPermit(uint256,address,((ad.details: Allows users to subscribe using Uniswap Permit2 for ERC20 approvals

params.amountIn: Amount of input tokens to subscribe with

syncPositionExternal(address).details: External function to sync a specific user's position

params.user: Address of the user whose position should be synced

syncStreamExternal().details: External function to sync the stream state and status

updateStreamMetadata(string).details: Allows the creator to update the stream metadata

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

withdraw(uint256).details: Allows users to withdraw their input tokens from the stream

params.cap: Amount of input tokens to withdraw

STREAM_FACTORY_ADDRESS().notice: Address of the stream factory that deployed this stream

factoryParamsSnapshot().notice: Snapshot of factory parameters at stream creation time

initialize((address,address,address,uint.notice: This function can only be called once and must be invoked by the factory

positionStorageAddress().notice: Address of the position storage contract

streamState().notice: Current state of the stream (distribution index, remaining tokens, etc.)

streamStatus().notice: Current status of the stream (Waiting, Bootstrapping, Active, etc.)

streamTimes().notice: Timing information for the stream phases

streamTokens().notice: Token addresses for input and output tokens

whitelistRoot().notice: Optional Merkle whitelist root; zero means no whitelist (public stream)
